Rulings.Edison:
● If this card was activated as Chain Link 1, it can't cause anything to miss its timing.
● If this card was activated as Chain Link 2, targeting "Dupe Frog", Dupe Frog will miss its timing.
You can read more about Timing here:
https://edisonformat.net/rules/compendium/missing-the-timing.
● If a Spell/Trap was targeted, and was chained, it's still destroyed, and you still draw (activated cards only leave the field once the entire chain has resolved).
Rulings.Tengu:
● If this card was activated as Chain Link 1, it cannot cause anything to miss its timing.
● If this card was activated as Chain Link 2, targeting "Dupe Frog", Dupe Frog will miss its timing.
You can read more about Timing here:
https://edisonformat.net/rules/compendium/missing-the-timing

Rulings.Base: 1. Tributing 1 face-up Level 4 Gemini monster you control is a cost. This effect targets 1 card on the field.\n2. Destroying the target card and drawing 1 card are resolved at the same time.\n3. If you cannot destroy the target card you cannot draw.

PSCT.Edison: ① Tribute 1 face-up Level 4 Gemini Monster, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it, and if you do, draw 1 card.
PSCT.Tengu: ① Tribute 1 face-up Level 4 Gemini Monster, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it, and if you do, draw 1 card.
